fields.description:
# Use an alloy project
# Delete file alloy.js in ..\plugins\ti.alloy\hooks folder
# Delete everything in the Resources folder
# Run build

*Result:* Build is broken as alloy pre-processor do not start

*Expected:* The alloy.js is re-created by build procedure and build procedure proceeds with the alloy pre-processor

At the same time build recovers alloy.js the if something is changed manually inside of the file.
Btw, is that right to attach the alloy.js file to the project structure? Imho, the file belongs to the build procedures. No?
fields.summary: alloy.js file is not recreated by build procedure
fields.environment: win 7, CLI version 4.0.1, Titanium SDK version 3.5.1.GA
